subject: Automobile Racing
Monaco Grand Prix (Auto Race)
lead_paragraph: Nico Rosberg took the overall Formula One championship lead from his teammate, Lewis Hamilton, who finished second in the race to give Mercedes a fifth straight 1-2 finish.
snippet: Nico Rosberg took the overall Formula One championship lead from his teammate, Lewis Hamilton, who finished second in the race to give Mercedes a fifth straight 1-2 finish.
